languages.text: The target suffers a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}. Each of the target's attacks deal additional {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}.
languages.original_text: Цель получает −20 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g}, но каждой атакой наносит дополнительный {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}варп-урон{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The target suffers a −20 penalty to Strength. Each of the target's attacks deal additional warp damage.

The target suffers a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}. Each of the target's attacks deal additional {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}.

The target suffers a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}. Each of the target's attacks deal additional {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}.

languages.text: Цель получает −20 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g}, но каждой атакой наносит дополнительный {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}варп-урон{/g}.

Das Ziel erleidet einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −20 auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}. Jeder Angriff des Ziels verursacht zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}Warp-Schaden{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Das Ziel erleidet einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −20 auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}. Jeder Angriff des Ziels fügt zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}Warp-Schaden{/g} zu.

languages.text: La cible subit une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g} de −20. Chaque attaque de la cible inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}dégâts Warp{/g} supplémentaires.
